text: If Auchan and Leroy Merlin companies continue do business in Russia, then the whole world should get to boycott their products.

@Laurent_Joffrin Hello!
Ukrainians request you to apply to Auchan and Leroy Merlin companies. Let them go out of the russian market. Let them stop to sponsor killing of civilians.

@abrezet Hello!
I`m from Ukraine and I`d like to ask you to request to Auchan and Leroy Merlin companies in order to they go out of the russian market. And therefore, these companies won`t sponsor russian aggression in Ukraine. Please, save the civilian persons in my counry.
@nastyabakulina_ я теж це помітив, це не дуже добре
Please, take it up with the French state to support Ukraine. Require to close the sky over Ukraine, transfer the weapon so that it can defend itself.

@louverneuilfr Hello!
 Every day, when you and the other world work, rest, bring up children, sleep and business is something else, The ukrainians don`t have it all. Please, help us.
Please, help us. Please, take it up with the French state to support Ukraine. Require to close the sky over Ukraine, transfer so that it can defend itself.

@Officialloiuse Hello!
Every day, when you and the other French work, rest, bring up children, sleep and business is something else, The ukrainians don`t have it all.
Nazy Russia don`t want to stop the war in Ukraine, and therefore you can still to halt the support of Putin. Please, human life is bigger that the your money. https://t.co/hPmpyNMCKU
Also, we request to stop the operations of French companies in Russia. Danone and Nestle have to halting funding for the russian military system, which kill non-military persons in Ukraine.

@FlorentBarraco1 Hello!
Ukrainians request you as the voice of society. Ukraine should acquire the status of an official candidate for EU membership.

@ElisaFerreiraEC Hello!
I as a Ukrainian citizen ask you to limit the issuance of visas because russian people must be held accountable for their inaction, at a time when russian soldiers commit acts of terrorism and genocide in Ukraine

@MarosSefcovic Hello!
Ukrainians ask you to cancel visas for the children of the russian military, financial, political elite, they must be returned to russia. This is the only way we will not allow them to escape responsibility for the war in Ukraine.

@Eerdmans Hello!
Russia entered in Ukraine. After 20-day of the war, Ukraine has already lost 100 children. Thousands of homes lost electricity, water, and heat.
Netherlands, don't contribute to the killing of Ukrainian people! Don`t buy russian oil.
#EmbargoOnrussianOil

@DerkBoswijk Hello!
Russian war against Ukrainians is a genocide. The war is financed with the money received from selling oil.  Netherlands, stop supporting war against Ukraine! Don`t buy russian oil. #EmbargoOnrussianOil
@olehbatkovych Спитайте, щось відомо про якісь результати українсько-російських перемовин?

During 19 days of war in Ukraine, russian troops killed over thousand civilians, among them 90 children!! Many schools, hospitals and houses were destroyed. This is terrorism against Ukrainians.  @FATFNews should designate Russia into "black list" #BlackListRussia https://t.co/EuXOB6MPUE
